name: Asteroids
tagline: Python 2.7 simpleGUI-based take on classic Asteroids game
body:
A Python SimpleGUI-based take on game classics featuring tiled animation, scoring, and sounds.
Created as a main project for an online gaming course.
![Asteroids preview](http://i1190.photobucket.com/albums/z449/dshatski/Stuff/Asteroids_zps25b6defc.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
